Description: Book of the Dead of Paser; sheet 18; 17 fragments withfull colour vignettes; yellow borders.
Curator's comments: This papyrus was formerly 15 sheets: frames 16-19 were formerly EA 9971 and frames 20-21 were formerly 9972, according to the Archival Papyrus Records Book. To be published by Guenther Lapp (Basel).
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (195)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (133518) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/133518)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, fractured, loss Black ink Red ink Pigment (loss) Backed: brown paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: C Curatorial condition comment: poor
